Author: Adrien Schildknecht
Comment:
You can repoduce this bug with :
#! /bin/sh

urxvt -name my_term &
sleep 1
urxvt -name my_scratchpad &
sleep 1
i3-msg '[instance="my_scratchpad"] move scratchpad'
urxvt -name my_floating &
sleep 1
i3-msg '[instance="my_floating"] floating enable'
i3-msg '[instance="my_term"] focus'
sleep 1
i3-msg scratchpad show
sleep 1
i3-msg scratchpad show
# my_term should be focus instead of my_floating

Author: Michael Stapelberg
Comment: Uhm, I think this patch merely reverses the situation: Now i3 will try to focus a tiling window all the time. Thatâ€™s still not necessarily the last focused window, right? :)

Author: Adrien Schildknecht
Comment:
I just made some tests, and everything work as expected, both with a floating window and a tilling window.
Maybe I should add comments and/or testcases.
